item.title: Create Boilerplate Project
item.description: create-boilerplate-project Generator that will create a base boilerplate project for various frameworks. No need to fork and clone boilerplate projects to keep up. This module will generate one for you based on many of the popular boilerplate projects.

item.description: project-hydra A salary cap tracking and planning application. Cross platform desktop and web application.

Error 404: Page Not Found It seems that the page that you’re trying to access doesn’t exist. :worried: If you’re sure that it exists, chances are it might have been moved to a new link! You may search for it on the home page.

Who is Daniel Vincent? I am a 28 year old geek, father, husband and amatuer hockey official who works as a software engineer during the week. I have been exposed to many different technologies during my short career in the software world. Technologies such as: C++ C# MSSQL MySQL Java ASP.NET Visual C++ Javascript (And its many flavors) React Meteor GraphQL MongoDB DynamoDB Amazon Web Services These are just a few of the technologies I have worked with over the years.
